channel.title: Need help making compiler [639] eclipse

item.title: Need help making compiler [639] eclipse
item.dc:creator: @smdson smdson
item.description:
@smdson wrote:

alright so i tryed making my own compiler but i keep on getting this http://prntscr.com/9hjlq ive been wondering how to fix it can someone help me please

@echo off
echo Compiling
“C:/Program Files/Java/jdk1.7.0_04/bin/javac.exe” -d bin -cp lib/; -sourcepath src src/org/dementhium/.java src/org/dementhium/net/.java src/org/dementhium/content/misc/.java src/org/dementhium/model/.java src/org/dementhium/model/player/.java
echo Complete
pause

thats whats in my compiler

Read full topic
